title: Eps. 96 - The Consistency Hack
description:
Everyone wants to win the game winner, hit the home run, or make a BIG impact in some way. All of those things are great but we forget about the small consistent things that it takes to make these things happen. On this week’s podcast the guys dive deep into the importance of consistency and how it will change your life. By the end of this episode you will understand that the real hack to becoming successful in life is to be consistent.
 Time Stamped Topics:
  [12:00] - Chicago Recap
 [19:30] - Magnificent Shopping Trip
 [33:00] - Consistency Hack
 [1:00:00] - Choose Wisely
 [1:10:15] - Grown Man Gift Zone
 [1:19:38] - Nugget Of The Day
  Things To Think About:
  “Consistency is one of the most under rated value.”
 “By being consistent you become people’s staple.”
 “The cheat code is the consistency.”
 “Hard work and consistency beats talent when talent doesn’t show up.”
  Listener Perks:
  Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just use the promo code “SUCCESS”. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
  See ET Live:
  November 12 Los Angeles, CA  Stay Ready Conference

 March 2018  Phenomenal Life Cruise

On this week’s podcast the guys dive deep into the importance of consistency and how it will change your life.
